data.name: Last Chickenburg
data.detailed_description:
JOIN DISCORD TO PARTICIPATE IN FUTURE PLAYTESTS!


About the Game



Last Chickenburg is an action-packed strategy based sandbox rpg, in which you will take control of a member of the House of Chicken in order to take back Chickenburg from the Chickenburg Baron. Fight to build your base, gather resources and take back the land that is rightfully yours from the humans who wish to eradicate and enslave you.





Last Chickenburg has a simple yet direct combat system appropriate for players of all skill levels. Select suitable armor type and weapons for each combat situation carefully to ensure victory against the enemies. Don’t forget to rest up before you go!







Survive in the tough wilderness by harvesting food and materials. Use those materials to craft a workbench and create basic weapons and armor to help you thrive in the hostile environment.







Recruit companions you meet while taking back Chickenburg to help you in your cause. Bring them with you on raids of enemy encampments. Put them to work in your settlements building weapons and armor to defend against enemy attacks, or send them on transport missions to bring resources to your other settlements.







Fight your way across the continent to free the rooster people from the clutches of the Brutal Baron.





Attack enemy settlements to gain control of their farms, smithys and mines as you build your resources to ultimately put an end to the Brutal Baron's reign!

data.short_description: Fight to build your base, gather resources and take back the land that is rightfully yours from the humans who wish to eradicate and enslave you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7 or later
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core or similar
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 900 series or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space

release_date.date: 加入愿望单 Wishlist The Game!

content_descriptors.notes: This game will splash blood in battle.
